settings.name: OSM Key
settings.description: OSM key class, as a string. Default is highway. For more information see the OSM Wiki page and the documentation.

settings.name: OSM value
settings.description: OSM value tag, as a string. Default is to use all values for a specified key, but the user can choose specific value tags for more targeted analysis. For more information see the OSM Wiki page and the documentation.

settings.name: Geometry of focus.
settings.description: geometry type to focus on, one of (point, line, polygon).

settings.name: CRS Code
settings.description: With crossing analysis it is strongly recommended that the data be converted into a PROJECTED coordinate reference system (e.g., UTM Zone, national grid, etc.). CRS codes (also known as EPSG codes) are integer numbers that correspond to a specified Spatial Coordinate Reference System. A searchable website for identifying the CRS code associated with a given reference system is: https://spatialreference.org.
